Words WORDSINFO Delete score QUICK LEVEL Settings Numbers settings Quick numbers settings Animation Memory Marathon
Open navigation drawer Close navigation drawer The Major Memory System The system works by converting number sequences into noun, nouns into images, and linking images into sequences. These sequences can be very complex and detailed.
\n\nThe building blocks of the system are the association of the numbers below with the following consonant sounds: 0 - s, z, soft-c \n1 - d, t ,th \n2 - n \n3 - m \n4 - r \n5 - l \n6 - j, sh, soft-ch \n7 - k \n8 - f,v \n9 - p,b How to use For example: 23 - n,m = Nemo, 64 - ch, r = chair\nNow you make image of this number - Nemo sitting on chair. This method is very similar to memory palace.\nWe have a list of words - ball, mobile phone, book.\n\nNow imagine a journey to the school, or somewhere else where you like to going. \nYou have to imagine that word as object with as many details as possible (colors).\nFirst word ball - imagine at start of walk. Mobile phone - imagine at some point in the middle, since this word is in middle of our list book - imagine somewhere in the end of the walk.\nYou can choose your own spots, some interesting places.\n\nOnce you\'ve imagined all the words, you can start go to walk in your head! Now you should see all words if you have done it right. Quick Level Graph Nothing to display delete score High Score Delete all score Do you really want to delete all score from quick level? YES CANCEL CANCEL Levels Quick Level "Level locked, complete " " to unlock." Use arrows to move to another part of number.\n Change number arrangement in settings like below.\n for example: 555555 -> 55 55 55 numbers length: ( "Remembered " " failed" display animation: on display animation: off Animation Actual number size in group: Actual number of groups in row: "Actual inspection time: " Actual inspection time: none display animation: off display animation: on Animation aaa Menu time: numbers: Level Inspection time Wait 3 seconds on start Quick - Level 1 How to play You will be shown number, which you have to memorize. If memorized number is correct you will pass to next level, where the length of number increases by one. one digit. After timer is done you will have to write down this number. "Quick - Level " Quick level settings Quick level settings Numbers settings Memory techniques Do not show again. retry Graph Delete score sort by date sort by score What was the number? score: "lives: " score: 0 seen new Do you really want to delete all scores? Rate us About app Share Send feedback General Settings Words Settings Numbers Settings Numbers Major System Words System Major Memory System "Highest score: " Score: How to play There will be always one word displayed.\nPress new if you haven\'t seen this word.\nPress seen if you already seen this word.\nCheck memory techniques in menu. About app Actual version: 1.0 latest version: 1.0 About author Application is created by GGJimmy\nContact me - ggjirka4@gmail.com This application was created to improve your memory skills in numbers and words. Try this app - Memory marathon, it will improve your memory and it\'s fun. MainSendFeedback Send Feedback Send Leave any message you want, if it\'s an issue I will try to fix it. Or should I add something? "Title: " Message Send feedback using: Retry High Score Graph No score to display.
